SEARCH

Class UserControllerTest

java.lang.Object
UserControllerTest
class UserControllerTest extends Object
Comprehensive JUnit 5 Test Suite for the UserController class.

This class ensures high code coverage by testing public API methods, UI logic via mocked components, and private helper methods via reflection. It handles JavaFX concurrency constraints and File I/O operations.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Zainab

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • initJavaFX

      @BeforeAll static void initJavaFX()
      Initializes the JavaFX runtime environment and sets necessary system properties. This is required to test JavaFX controls and simulate environment variables.

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach void setUp() throws Exception
      Sets up the test environment before each test case. Creates a dummy data file, initializes the controller, and injects mock UI components.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection or file I/O fails.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach void tearDown()
      Cleans up the test environment after each test case. Deletes the dummy data file to ensure test isolation.

    • testInitialize

      @Test void testInitialize()
      Tests the initialization of the TableView and its columns.

    • testSetCurrentUser

      @Test void testSetCurrentUser()
      Tests setting the current user details and updating the welcome label. Verifies that the label text and style are updated correctly.

    • testLegacySetters

      @Test void testLegacySetters()
      Tests the legacy setter methods for username, membership, and credentials.

    • testHandleBorrowBookSuccess

      @Test void testHandleBorrowBookSuccess()
      Tests the successful borrowing of an available book.

    • testHandleBorrowBookNoSelection

      @Test void testHandleBorrowBookNoSelection()
      Tests failure to borrow a book when no item is selected.

    • testHandleBorrowBookWithOutstandingFines

      @Test void testHandleBorrowBookWithOutstandingFines()
      Tests failure to borrow a book when the user has outstanding fines on other items.

    • testHandleBorrowBookAlreadyBorrowed

      @Test void testHandleBorrowBookAlreadyBorrowed()
      Tests failure to borrow a book that is already borrowed by the current user.

    • testHandleBorrowBookUnavailable

      @Test void testHandleBorrowBookUnavailable()
      Tests failure to borrow a book that is unavailable (borrowed by someone else).

    • testHandleReturnBookSuccess

      @Test void testHandleReturnBookSuccess()
      Tests returning a book successfully when there are no fines.

      @Test void testHandleReload()
      Tests reloading data from the file.

    • testHandleLogout

      @Test void testHandleLogout()
      Tests the logout handler. Verifies that it runs without logic errors (ignoring UI stage switching errors).

    • testFileParsingResilience

      @Test void testFileParsingResilience() throws Exception
      Tests file parsing with corrupted lines using reflection on private methods. Ensures robustness against malformed data.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • testPrivateHelpers

      @Test void testPrivateHelpers() throws Exception
      Tests private helper methods via Reflection. Covers parsing utilities and string normalization.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • testRowFactoryLogic

      @Test void testRowFactoryLogic() throws Exception
      Tests TableRow styling logic via Reflection. Simulates the CellFactory to verify row coloring logic.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • testCellFactoryLogic

      @Test void testCellFactoryLogic() throws Exception
      Tests TableCell rendering logic via Reflection. Verifies that sensitive data (Due Date, Fine) is hidden for items not owned by the user.
      Throws:
      Exception
